pages.text: Grim beings, crawling straight from the pits of Hell. Demons are usually $(l:bewitchment:rituals/summon_demon)Summoned$() and will attack any living being around them, including other Demons, usually with fire.$(br2)Demons can be safely approached with $(l:bewitchment:tools/besmirched_armor)Besmirched Armor$(), offering their trades.$(br2)Slaying a Demon will yield at least one precious Demon Heart.
